subjects.name: Data Processes
subjects.description: The Data Science Process is a systematic approach to solving data-related problems

subjects.name: Data Visualization
subjects.description: Visual analytics combines automated analysis techniques with interactive visualizations for an effective understanding, reasoning and decision making on the basis of very large and complex datasets

subjects.name: Statistical Data Analysis
subjects.description: Statistical methods help us investigate questions in an objective manner. Statistical problem solving is an investigative process

subjects.name: Open Data and Knowledge Graphs
subjects.description: Main foundations for Open Data and Knowledge Graphs, including the W3C recommendations that are applicable in this area

subjects.name: Cloud Computing
subjects.description: Cloud Computing consists of hardware and software resources made available on the internet as they are managed by the third party services.

subjects.name: Machine Learning
subjects.description: Machine Learning transforms data into knowledge and provides general purpose systems that adapt to the circumstances
